list_definition.definition: (singular or plural) a man, his wife and their children

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: These houses were built for families
The (members of the) Clark family are all very athletic

list_definition.definition: a group of people related to each other, including cousins, grandchildren etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He comes from a wealthy family

list_definition.definition: the children of a man and his wife

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: When I get married, I would like a large family.

list_definition.definition: a group of plants, animals, languages etc that are connected in some way

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: In spite of its name, a koala bear is not a member of the bear family.
